channel.title: Rep messages :P
channel.description: Idk what this means "mscp" can someone explain??

item.title: Rep messages :P
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

To clarify, The Reaper X:

Rep given on moparscape will say “-mscp”, and rep given on moparisthebest will say “-mitb”. UNLESS you already have 200 rep on moparscape, then it will say “-mitb”, regardless of what site it was given on.

Read full topic

item.title: Rep messages :P
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Kingen50cent:

“Rep++ me and i’ll rep++ you” is that illegal here? if so tell me because i didn’t know <,<

No this is not allowed. Infact if you are caught doing this, your rep will be reset to 0.

Kingen50cent:

sorry:( because ive been on alot of forums and some of them you can trade rep i didn’t know you couldn’t here.

When you joined this website you agreed that you read the rules.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Rule 11:
Never ask for reputation(rep). Reputation is to be handed out, at the forum members digression, as a reward for adding quality content to a thread, or the forum in general. Reputation abuse is punished.

Read full topic

item.title: Rep messages :P

item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Rep means nothing, EoD.

Read full topic

item.title: Rep messages :P
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“Jamie1200, post:23, topic:323387”][quote author=xxlukexx link=topic=419783.msg3083916#msg3083916 date=1262374023]

Seriously Jamie, fuck off.

All you do is act like a fucking moderator BUT your not, now please stop it. We all know that rep gets abused on here and everyone does it.
[/quote]Because you dislike someone, it doesn’t require you to rage. And because you state things that could potentially change the outcome of the shit-half of this community, it doesn’t mean you’re a want-to-be moderator.

LOL, one moron won’t make all the rest act like moderators.
Him actually acting like a moderator just makes him look like a stupid fucker.

The one who stands tallest is always last to fall.[/quote]

Wut?

Read full topic

item.title: Rep messages :P
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Rep has no meaning so really who cares. This isn’t the old system we’re 50rep=MSCP CM. Rep used to have a meaning here, but it got out of control and that’s why we have vet which is vet in only.

I don’t see why you guys make such a big deal about this.

Read full topic

item.title: Rep messages :P
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

[quote=“Java Is My Bitch, post:19, topic:323387”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=419783.msg3083872#msg3083872 date=1262371661]

[quote author=Kingen50cent link=topic=419783.msg3083828#msg3083828 date=1262369009]

Thanks for helping rep++

rep abuse much

Dude i didnt give him rep just because of this
he have done other stuff. and i couldn’t give him rep for those stuff that he did because i didn’t have 15,
So i saved it till now.
[/quote]Then provide rep for that reason in that thread, not this one…? You can easily look for the thread in the search bar if you can’t find it. And besides this, your signature says:

Rep++ Me And I’ll Rep++ You!

You can’t play that off.

Ontopic:

It means the rep was given on MoparScape, whereas ‘mitb’ means the rep was given on Moparisthebest (i think).

I’ve received rep that said mitb, yet my reputation over there hasn’t increased. So I’m not sure that’s the case.
[/quote]Wtf… Rep is just a number, who cares?[/quote]

Nearly everyone does.
Look around in the help sections, you’ll see loads of topics with titles like: “+rep for help”
I rarely see a topic that says “Will say thanks for your help…”

Read full topic

item.title: Rep messages :P
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:15, topic:323387”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=419783.msg3083898#msg3083898 date=1262372932]

Seriously Jamie, fuck off.

All you do is act like a fucking moderator BUT your not, now please stop it. We all know that rep gets abused on here and everyone does it.
[/quote]Because you dislike someone, it doesn’t require you to rage. And because you state things that could potentially change the outcome of the shit-half of this community, it doesn’t mean you’re a want-to-be moderator.

LOL, one moron won’t make all the rest act like moderators.
Him actually acting like a moderator just makes him look like a stupid fucker.[/quote]I said potentially, and I even said it doesn’t make you “act like a moderator”. Once again, you’re raging, making yourself look like:

xxlukexx:

a stupid fucker.

Perhaps those words are too strong, but you’re being completely ignorant right now.

[quote=“casey., post:16, topic:323387”]Ok rep doesn’t matter here if you haven’t figured out. Quit being wanna-be mods and making it a big deal.

This isn’t rep abuse, he answered a question, so you he has every right to reward it.[/quote]I was referring to his signature, and I said that if he must rep anyone it would be more appropriate to do so in the thread it deserves.

[quote=“relmitos, post:18, topic:323387”]I just repped Casey for telling you guys the truth.[/quote]The truth isn’t as cool as you put it out to be.

[quote=“Telenim, post:17, topic:323387”]i reported casey when he rept everyone for no reason[/quote]This forum is infamous for announcing unnecessary crap. Hence, this thread.

Java Is My Bitch:

Wtf… Rep is just a number, who cares?

We’ve established this so many times, who cares?

Nothing I’ve said it personal.

Read full topic
